title: The News with Rick Sanchez - October 21, 2019 (20:00 ET)
text:
Rick Sanchez reports on ongoing protests all over the world from London to Lebanon to Hong Kong and what's fueling these protest movements, escalating violence and repressive reaction.

Then Chilean journalist Patricio Zamorano explains why Chile is erupting in protest. RT's Madina Kochenova reports on the ongoing Catalan independence movement in Spain. RT America's Michele Greenstein reports from Hong Kong on the weekend's Hong Kong protests, which devolved into vandalism and arson.

Plus, RT America's Trinity Chavez reports on the discovery of a lost city in the jungles of Cambodia.
description: Rick Sanchez reports on ongoing protests all over the world from London to Lebanon to Hong Kong and what's fueling these protest movements, escalating violence and repressive reaction
